projects.title: AI-Powered Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: an AI-Powered Chatbot Interface that blends deep contextual understanding, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and multilingual (i18n) support into a single, modern full-stack application.

projects.title: PostIt: AI-Based Media Post Generator
projects.description: PostIt is a full-stack AI-powered application that automates social media content generation using React for the frontend and Django REST Framework for the backend.

projects.title: Project Management Tool (Web App)
projects.description: A full-featured project management platform with role-based access (Admin, Project Manager, Member). Users can manage projects, assign tasks, create issues and epics, comment, filter, and track progress with a user-friendly UI. Includes dashboards, notifications, and real-time updates..
